reviews.review: Very impressed with the whole series, awesome games with awesome stories. only issue i have with the games are that the remastered versions kept crashing and infinite was pretty choppy.

Honestly, I can not recommend Bioshock: Infinite. 
The "story" is nonexistant until the end. 
The player is basically thrown into a linear story with absolutely no incentive to continue playing it.
There are skills/vigors but there is no sense of progression because the game consists of two things:
1- Looting
2-Fighting waves of enemies. One after the other. 

Managed to finish the game in ~15 hours but that's because I actually fell asleep a few times in the middle of the game while looting. Plus, the game was being played on hard difficulty. Game itself is probably 6-8 hours long if played on normal difficulty. 

My advice: Save yourself some time/money and go read/watch the ending on YT.

The game was pretty good overall. Definity worth a playthough. The story is short though, I got though the campaign in about 7 hours. The story is pretty good overall but I feel like it got a little sluggish in the middle. I will say though that the ending was 10/10. I recommend you buy this game when it is on sale and you want a game to kill time.

스토리가 이해가 안되고 병맛같은 자막으로 뭔소리를 하는건지 몰라도 게임을 플레이하는 데 몰입도가 상당히 좋다.
반드시 게임 클리어 후엔 스토리 해석을 봐야 한다.

Игра на высшем уровне. Графика отличная(графодрочеры пошли нахер), физика хороша, сюжет интересный. Персонажи(основные естественно) довольно интересные(особенно ЭЛизабет(фап фап), эмоциональные(долой мыльного Натана Дрейка). Можно заметить если отвлекаться на элизабет(ну вы поняли зачем). 
  Цена укусит(лично для меня даже 1к чисто за 1 игру, даже хорошую ну многовато(скупердяй стайл)), по этому попал на скидку и взял весь комплект(биошок 1/2+remastered/инфинити+допы(2 битвы)) за демократическую цену 600 деревянных.
 Кароче 11 ехидных смешков Елизабет из 10

Quality game but not as good as 1 or 2. Interesting world but the gameplay is less interesting. For some reason they decided to only allow you to carry 2 weapons and made the game more linear. The story also isn't as good, and I personally don't care for the ending. Still a fun game with some good shooter gameplay, but I would recommend the others before it.
este juego es una obra maestra para mi el mejor juego sin duda

핑커톤 소속 탐정인 부커드윗이 엘리자베스를 찾기 위해 하늘의 도시 컬럼비아로 모험을 떠나는 게임이에용♥.♥ 
아름다운 컬럼비아를 구경하면서 여러가지 무기도 쓰고 음식도 먹고 활력도 쓸 수 있어용>.<
컬럼비아로 오신다면 엘리자베스를 찾아가세용♥.♥

BioShock Infinite, 2013 yılında gerek hikaye ve atmosferi, gerek müzikleri ile kendini kanıtlayan; çıktığı yılda Game of the Year için ön saflarda yarışan bir oyun olmuştur.
Naçizane fikrim her kişinin denemesi gereken oyunlar arasındadır.


[h1]Pozitif (+) Yönleri:[/h1]
+Karmaşık fakat ince işlenmiş hikaye ve sunum
+Oynanış mekanikleri
+Grafikler ve atmosfer
+Karakterler (Booker DeWitt, Elizabeth, Lutece kardeşler, Zachary Hale Comstock)
+Bilim ve Sanat (Paralel evrenler, mekanlar)
+Güzel bir optimizasyon (Game Debate 9.6/10 optimizasyon skoru)

[h1]Negatif (-) Yönleri:[/h1]
-Hayalleri süsleyen bir gökyüzü şehri fakat bir o kadar da cansız ve sıradan


[h1][u]Oyun Bilgisi[/u][/h1]

[u][b]Hikaye:[/b][/u] Oyun hakkında spoiler vermeden hikayeyi kısa bir şekilde anlatmaya çalışcağım.
Oyundaki ana karakterimiz Booker DeWitt, geçmişte yaşadığı olayların etkisinde kalıp, üstüne birde karısının çocuğun doğumu sırasında ölmesi ile depresyona girerek kendini alkol ve kumar bağımlılığına kaptırır. Olaylar böyle gelişir ve büyürken DeWitt, kimsenin borçlanmak istemeyeceği kişilere borçlanır. DeWitt'in borçlarına karşılık Columbia adında bir şehirde Elizabeth isimli bir kızı New York'a, borçlu olduğu kişilere kaçırması istenir. Booker DeWitt de bunu kabul edip borçlarını ödemek adına yola çıkar ve hikaye burada başlar.

[u][b]Şahıs Kadrosu (Ana Karakterler):[/b][/u]

[b]Booker DeWitt:[/b] Oyundaki yönettiğimiz karakter. Günahkar, alkol ve kumar bağımlısı, borçlarını ödemek isteyen kişi
[b]Elizabeth:[/b] Columbia'da bulunan kaçırmamız istenilen o güzel kız
[b]Robert Lutece ve Rosalind Lutece:[/b] Kısacası "Lutece Kardeşler" oyundaki gizemli kişi (ya da kişiler)
[spoiler]İki kardeş nasıl tek kişi oluyor?[/spoiler]
[b]Zachary Hale Comstock:[/b] Oyundaki peygamber ve Columbia şehrinin kurucusu


[u][b]Zaman:[/b][/u] 1912 yılında, Amerikan dışavurumculuğunun gelişim dönemi


[u][b]Mekan:[/b][/u] Columbia isimli bir gökyüzü şehri


[h1][u]Genel İzlenimlerim[/u][/h1]

Oyunu sıkılmadan uzun uzun oynadım. Oynadığım dönemde bu tarz oyunlara açlığım mı vardı emin değilim fakat benim için sürükleyici bir deneyim olmuştu. "Acaba ilerde ne olacak?" diye meraklandırıyordu.

[i]This review has been written in Turkish.[/i]
Was kind of a bland experience for me compared to the other games. And the story wasn't engaging at all.
magical and radical

Nie da się tej grze odmówić trzech rzeczy: 
- imponująca Columbia w pięknym, kolonialnym stylu
- przyprawiający o zawroty głowy twist fabularny
- gra na prawdę sprawia, że zależy ci na Elizabeth

Poza tym jest bardzo średnio. Nużące, monotonne strzelanie. Całą grę da się przejść z podstawowym pistoletem i waląc z pięści. Projekty bossów rozczarowują - albo są to kolejne fale mięsa armatniego albo w bossa trzeba po prostu wypalić 10000 pocisków. Gra jest sztucznie wydłużana backtracking'iem i arenami, które należy oczyścić. 

Autorzy chcieli dać graczom filozoficzną opowieść o równoległych wszechświatach, przeznaczeniu, poświęceniu itd. Pojawia się tu ten sam problem co w każdej opowieści z podróżami między różnymi wszechświatami i podróżami w czasie - szlag trafia wszystkie związki przyczynowo-skutkowe - zostaje tylko fabularny chaos. Gdy nie musimy się już trzymać żadnej logiki możemy sprawę zakończyć w dowolny sposób. W tym sensie zakończenie gry jest doprawdy bezsensowne i oznacza cokolwiek. Gra porusza także problem rewolucji ale uderza w najbardziej wyświechtany motyw - dumni buntownicy o wolność stają się tacy sami jak tyran, którego obalili *ziew*. 

Ta cała filozofia została brutalnie wciśnięta w formę liniowego, prostego fps'a. Grę polecam każdemu spróbować ale przyczynowo-skutkowe pogmatwanie zawsze stanowi dla mnie fundamentalną wadę książki/gry/filmu.

In my Opinion the story is very trippy, or mindblowing.

Отличная игра. Отличный шутер. Единственное, неочень понравилась последняя битва, по тому что, как это бывает - переборщили. 

А вот season pass очень сильно разачаровал, хотя ценой как отдельная игра.

ムービーや会話パートが長い。それも純粋なムービーではなく、演出を見て ごく短い距離を移動してオブジェクトを調べて また演出を見て･･･というものなので、スキップも出来ず、また他の作業をする事も出来ない。
十数分プレイしてもまだゲームらしい事が出来ず、先が思いやられたのでプレイを終了してしまった。
物語や演出を見るのが好きな人にとっては面白いものなのかもしれないが、ゲームがしたい私にとっては期待はずれだった。
Awesome game with great graphics and well put together storyline. would definitely recommend this to anyone who is in search of an awesome game to curb their boredom

一开始并没有get到伊丽莎白的萌点啊，觉得不断有血包和子弹就没什么难度了啊，直到小白抓走后血虐……后期回来了真好～～
直到流程快结束才领悟可以升级技能啊，一般就是用电流，之后应该也不会去刷成就了sign.
对于不能用箭头指路的，简直找到崩溃啊，来回跑了三四趟终于撞上了唔～
武器就呵呵了，枪支分不清，然后技术渣不能爆头好难过。果然还是很喜欢劳拉的弓箭，潜行超爽。
以及晕天际线……终于用上了鼠标，但在转向时还是触控板好用，突突突就转向无能了唔～
但画风还是很美哒，截了好多图，就酱~

但還是值得體驗

顶级悬疑片的剧情，海葬dlc又把故事与一代相连。
毋庸置疑的神作，第九艺术的完美诠释。

生化奇兵系列一直是我认为讲乌托邦故事讲的最好的作品，没有之一。两个不同的乌托邦文明走向相同的结局。人类最终还是败给了自己基因里的那点劣根性。
无限加上DLC海葬，将三部曲完美的结合在了一起。讲了一个因果循环无法挣脱的故事。有点像宿命论又有点像无间道里的刘建明。
Elizabeth的美，Booker的勇。两人的配合让游戏多了很多乐趣。当结局到来，Booker终于明白了自己这一路走来的意义，做出了最后的选择。
忏悔与更正成了游戏的核心。Booker与Comstock成了平行宇宙的对立面。但不管是哪一位，都带给了女儿无尽的痛苦。
神棍二人组男女Lutece成了命运的指引者，让每一个人走向自己选择的结局。没人能逃得出这因果报应，也没人能做了错事不知悔改。
近乎完美的故事，三部曲最好的终结。
你们让开 小姐姐是我的了！！！
第九艺术

oyunun grafikleri fantastik bi hava katıyor bu fantastik hava hikayenin gidişatına  göre ilerleyen müziklerle dahada heyecanlanıyor. oyunun hikeyesi ayrı bi sürükleyici. zevkle 10 saati geçgin oynarsınız

Gra z bogatą fabułą, po jej przejsciu odczuwa się pustkę, chce się więcej. Jej zakończenie skłania do przemyślenia jeszcze raz całej historii. Dostępny jest spory arsenał broni i wigorów których działanie można łączyć aby były bardziej efektywne.
Bardzo spodobał mi się pistolet którego konstrukcja podobna jest do prawdziwego Mausera C96 używanego podczas pierwszej i drugiej wojny światowej przez armię niemiecką.
Gra godna polecenia.
A good dozen hours to get a good story. The game has beautiful environments filled with sights and sounds, it may be on the rails for progression but its a good ride with a wonderful finish.

In the beginning I was amazed by the atmosphere and really wanted to enjoy the game but somehow I couldn't.
The combat was repetitive, boring and dull - I don't feel those weapons, every kind of weapon seems the same and I see no difference in usage. The same goes for those special tricks - no difference. Also every enemy is the same, AI is stupid, location doesn't effect tactics. As I played on the highest difficulty I wanted it to be a challenge but I simply ran forward and shooted for several hours. The story was also a dissappointment because "the big plot twist/ending" is obvious after the first few flashbacks. 
4/10
Good and completed even without ever playing 1. or 2. game and it stay that way.

Arte

This game truly is amazing. I just got into the BioShock series (played 1 first, then Infinite, will play 2 soon) and damn am I impressed. The storytelling in this game is just as strong as the original, if not better. The combat is actually tons of fun (which I can't say for 1). The environments are immersive to the point that I don't even really mind spending a lot of time roaming for collectibles (which do a great job at enhancing the storytelling) - there's just that much attention to detail.

If you're looking for a well-made, story-focused FPS that has lots of ways to play out fights, this game is for you. Get ready for a super emotional tale.

The Burial at Sea DLC is also just as good and a must-play if you buy the game.

I honestly can't recommend it enough.

If you've already played Bioshock and you liked it, buy this. Chances are good you'll like this too.
If you haven't played either and are trying to decide which one to play, here's the deal:

Do you want challenging gameplay, a sense of isolation, and a good straightforward plot packed with objectivist philosophy? Play Bioshock.

Do you want easier but more varied gameplay, a sense of action, and a vague, slightly pretentious plot packed with religious symbolism? Play Bioshock Infinite.


In my opinion neither game is better than the other. The pros and cons of both games even out pretty well. Whether you'll like Bioshock or Bioshock Infinite better all depends on what you like in a game. 

8/10
할인하길레 삿는데 정말 재미밌네요
진짜 예술같은 게임 너무 예쁘고 재미있다. 솔직히 산다고해서 후회는 안할 게임이다. 그래픽 하나하나 너무 예쁘고 무엇보다 여주가 이쁘다

Un gran juego de una gran saga empezemos con el analisis

Jugabilidad

-Lo unico que me falla en este juego son las ineccesarias peleas y el que te hagan recojer de la basura esto no es como el primero no es necesario.

-Y que Elizabeth te da objetos que a lo mejor en ese momento no necesitas ejemplo: estas a un punto de vida y te da municion.

-Me encanta como enlazan los juegos en estos finales sobretodo en el dlc que para mi fue una muy buena compra.

-Visualmente precioso.

Historia

El climax de esta triologia que necesitaba explicando y dando respuestas a esos cavos sueltos y con ese Dlc que te deja impactado y con ganas de mas acabas amando todo lo relacionado con esta saga y este videojuego.

Recomiendo este juego 10/10 igual a su Dlc.

Ta gra to arcydzieło.Fabuła wciąga od samego początku,a widok miasta Columbia wgniata w fotel.Już pierwsza cześć Bioshocka była genialna,ale Infinite jest produkcją jeszcze lepszą.

Plusy:
-świetna fabuła
-niesamowity styl artystyczny
-wciągający gameplay i satysfakcjonujące walki
-znakomita oprawa graficzna i dźwiękowa
-duży wybór broni i wigorów
-prawdopodobnie najładniejsze miasto w historii gier
-Elizabeth :)
-rewelacyjne DLC Burial at Sea,czyli powrót do Rapture

Minusy:
-za krótka

Bioshock Infinite es la tercera entrega de la saga Bioshock pero es un juego perfectamente disfrutable sin haber jugado las anteriores entregas ya que se puede tomar su historia de forma independiente. Es un shooter en primera persona, tiene una banda sonora más que buena, teniendo en cuenta que es un shooter y por lo general este aspecto no es muy pulido por los desarrolladores en este tipo de juegos, así mismo cuenta con unos muy buenos efectos de sonido y un espectacular doblaje al español, sumado a unos escenarios sencillamente espectaculares y un diseño de enemigos sobresaliente. En fin, es un Bioshock, tiene una historia de 10 con una jugabilidad muy divertida y frenética.

Requisitos. Medios. Requiere gráfica, pero es un juego del 2013, sin embargo, tiene compatibilidad con GeForce Experience y no está mal optimizado.

Historia y personajes. 10/10 

Jugabilidad/Controles. 9.0/10 (Cabe recalcar que el gameplay de un BioShock siempre es distinto a los demás shooters y los controles no son tan comunes y puede costar bastante pillarlos dependiendo de qué tan acostumbrado estés a otros juegos, pero los puedes personalizar a tu gusto, las ventajas de pc)

Escenarios/Personajes/Interfaz 9.0/10 (Sería un 10 seguro, pero por desgracia no hay mucha variedad de enemigos, los que hay están muy bien, pero eso no quita que son pocos realmente)

Soundtrack/Doblaje/Efectos / 10/10

Detalles a tener en cuenta:

*Tiene el modo 1999 para los que quieran enfrentarse a un reto
*Te permite repetir zonas que ya has terminado (esto va ligado al siguiente detalle)
*Posee items coleccionables
*No es indispensable comprar los dlcs, ya es un buen juego sin ellos. Aunque, expanden la historia y aportan bastante al título y en el pack coleccionista salen muy baratos realmente.

Calidad precio.
Good story, simple game play. all around a good time.

10/10

Quick Note
I would like to start this off with saying I bought Bioshock: The Collection during the summer sale for only $15 (This conatins EVERYTHING, The games as well as the remastered versions of 1 & 2, and even all the DLC!) I Played through the main storyline on easy in just under 14 hours. Burial at Sea Ep 1 was done at about the 15.5-16 hour mark. I just finished Burial at Sea Ep 2 with a total of 22+ hours. I have only played Bioshock Infinite and none of the ther Bioshocks (yet.) I watched a playthrough of each game and their DLC on Youtube sometime in 2016. 4.9/5 Stars 


Main Storyline
Playthrough Style: Aggressive, Loot Bug
Play time: ~14 Hours
Difficulty: Easy

The gameplay of Bioshock Infinite was fantastic! The controls are well placed and easy to use (SIDE NOTE: I utilized the additional buttons on my mouse for melee and aiming.) The storyline is very full 97% of the time, there are a few times it got (at least it felt) off course at times but the greatness of the rest of the story counteracted that. This was my first experience with a semi-recent story driven game, my previous being Portal 2. It was a very pleasing flow of events and movement, to just get to run around and hop from sky hook to sky hook blasting, shooting, and bashing enemies was the thrill and adventure I expected. The graphics are very well done and on par with if not better than most graphics from 2013. A very bright and open game compared to the previous Bioshocks. With my GTX 750Ti I can run the game on the highest graphic settings with no visible issues. The music and sounds will normally makr or break a game for me. The music is fantastic, honestly amazing. Gotta love 1912. Needless to say Bioshock Infinite has become my all time favorite video game.


Burial at Sea: Episode 1
Playthrough Style: Semi-Aggressive (Leaning towards the aggressive side), Loot Bug
Play time: ~2 Hours
Difficulty: Easy

Back in Rapture, Pre-Sh*t Show too! Just amazing. Beautifully created and imagined, you get to spend some time in Rapture prior to the first game. Much like the main game, BaS:E1 just exceeds expectations in gameplay and graphics. Pretty much the same controls as the main game you can feel right at home while wandering around or fighting baddies. A big contrast would be the dark dinginess, once you get into Fontaine's, definitely a bit more spooky than previous. As this wasn't the longest playthrough there honestly isn't too much else to say about Burial at Sea: Episode 1.


Burial at Sea: Episode 2
Playthrough Style: Non-Lethal (kill Count: 0), Loot Bug
Play time: ~6 Hours
Difficulty: Easy

Wow... That's all I'll say about the ending of BaS:E1. I feel... I feel... different, more like.. a woman... WHAT?!?!? I'M ELIZABETH!!?!?!?! That's new!You are now playing as Elizabeth. But that isn't the only new thing. New mechanics have been introduced to the game. Like the 1998 Mode, similar to 1999 Mode but forces you to play a non-Lethal on top of the 1999 Mode difficulty. Stealth, Stealth is the new name of the game, at least my playthrough was. Enemies now have visible and a new sense of awareness from the main game. Sneaking around avoiding things that make noise such at broken glass and puddles of water (and other liquids) definitely adds to the feel of playing as someone like Elizabeth. You are given a new (to Bioshock Infinite) weapon to use, a crossbow, which fires non-lethal bolts like the tranquilizer bolt, the noise-maker bolt, and the Gas Bolt. You get to crawl around in airvents to escape enimies and even find secret rooms! The graphics still continue to shine as you run around the the underwater prison. The storyline for this is just filled to the brimand ready to be played over and over again. My biggest complaint (a small one at that) is that it feels like too much of just running in circles around the map going into each building a few times.


Overview

Do I recommend this game? Uhhhh... YEAH!

If you are seriously contemplating getting this game like I was for about a year, GET IT! It is worth every penny and I look forward to playing it for many more hours to come.
Thanks for reading my whole review!

For many years after first seeing and hearing about this game from others, I considered it one of the finest video games in history. But I had never actually got around to playing it myself until recently, and after playing through the main game and DLC, I can safely say that this game is by far the greatest game I have ever played.

This game is filled with sharp, fluid gameplay which is enhanced tenfold by Elizabeth. Graphically speaking, the game has stunning visuals with a beautiful setting far easier on the eyes than Rapture, although there is still a great deal of variety throughout the campaign.

By far the strongest aspect of Bioshock Infinite is its incredible story. The game features a wide variety of memorable characters like the Luteces, Daisy Fitzroy, Zachary Comstock, Booker DeWitt(the player character), and of course, Elizabeth. The story itself has incredible analysis of society and the world as it is, exploring themes of racism, religion, revolution, and more.

Ever since its intial release, I considered Skyrim my favorite game because of what it meant to me and how it inspired me to love video games as a form of storytelling and even as a form of art. But after the tremendous impact that Bioshock Infinite has had on me, I can no longer consider any other game to be my favorite. If you in any way believe that video games can be a strong artistic medium, then this game is an absolute must-play.

Отличный сюжет, геймплей и....Элизабет. Пожалуй самый полезный персонаж в видеоиграх. И денюжкой поделится и здоровье, с солями немного отольет и дверцы с сейфами взломает. Не напарница, а прелесть.. В общем, к покупке оэязательна

I see from other people's reviews that many thought this game pretty much the best thing ever. I'm sorry to say I'm not amongst them. I really wanted to like Bioshock Infinite, but I just found it boring.

I applaud the ambition of the story, and even in some parts the execution of the game, but I think in the end it falls between two stools. It's primarily a FPS but the FPS elements are repetitive. Even in hard mode there's no real challenge, especially since each time you die, you return to the scene as you left it, with health partially restored. So even the most useless player will eventually get through each battle - so no real challenge. The 'vigours' seem cool at first but most are just different versions of the same grenade/trap option. The other side of the game is the story, which seems to have all the grown up elements in place for an intriguing counterfactual history, but for whatever reason I just didn't find it sufficiently absorbing or interesting. 

Maybe the problem is that this is the first Bioshock game I've ever played, perhaps having the background of the preceding games makes Bioshock Infinite special. I love FPS games with a great single player story, having for example greatly enjoyed and replayed the Wolfenstein games recently. Those games made me itch to get back to playing them in a way Bioshock Infinite just doesn't

¿Qué puedo decir que no se haya dicho ya de la maravillosa historia, el llamativo apartado visual, la bien escogida banda sonora, la frenética jugabilidad de por sí de la saga Bioshock ahora viendose enriquecida gracias a la verticalidad que aportan los aerorailes al combate y los desgarros de Elizabeth o su relación con Booker y la sociedad de Columbia y la evolución que presenta a través del juego, o la crítica hacia el racismo o la esclavitud que lleva a cabo el título por hacer algún ejemplo?

Aunque a parte de estas grandes virtudes, Bioshock Infinite presenta algunos fallos bajo mi punto de vista, como el exceso de tiroteo que entorpecen la historia, lo rebuscado de algunos puntos de la trama,...

Pero en conjunto, solo puedo considerarlo una obra maestra, y un ejemplo que deben seguir los videojuegos más "mainstream" sobre como llevar una historia al videojuego.
近年玩過最好的遊戲沒有之一
